org.zeromq.api

Interface CloneClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CloneClientImpl

    public interface CloneClient
    An API client implementing the CHP (Clustered Hashmap Protocol), which will communicate via an agent (background thread) with a pair of stateful servers using the Binary Star Pattern.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Destroy this client.
      void connect(String address, int port)
      Connect to a new server endpoint.
      String get(String key)
      Look up the value in the shared hashmap.
      Map<String,String> getAll()
      Look up all values in the shared hashmap.
      void set(String key, String value)
      Set a new value in the shared hashmap, with no ttl.
      void set(String key, String value, long ttl)
      Set a new value in the shared hashmap.
      void subscribe(String subtree)
      Specify subtree for snapshot and updates.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(String subtree)
        Specify subtree for snapshot and updates.

        Note: We must do this before connecting to a server as the subtree specification is sent as the first command to the server.

        Parameters:
        subtree - The prefix (subtree) to subscribe to

      • connect

        void connect(String address,
             int port)
        Connect to a new server endpoint. We can connect to at most two servers.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the server to connect to
        port - The port on the server to connect to

      • set

        void set(String key,
         String value)
        Set a new value in the shared hashmap, with no ttl.
        Parameters:
        key - The key associated with the new value
        value - The new value to set in the shared hashmap

      • set

        void set(String key,
         String value,
         long ttl)
        Set a new value in the shared hashmap.
        Parameters:
        key - The key associated with the new value
        value - The new value to set in the shared hashmap
        ttl - The time-to-live for the given value, in seconds

      • get

        String get(String key)
        Look up the value in the shared hashmap.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to look up
        Returns:
        The value associated with the given key, or null

      • getAll

        Map<String,String> getAll()
        Look up all values in the shared hashmap.
        Returns:
        The entire map

      • close

        void close()
        Destroy this client.
